About me

My name is Refik Gulak. I am from Turkey. I live in Manchester. I was a Physics teacher in Turkey. I studied courses on numerical algorithms at university. I have been interested in IT (information technology) for a long time.

I decided that the most suitable field for my future is IT (information technology) . I started attending IT (information technology) courses in October 2020. I completed the Full Stack Automation Engineer course. I attended the Full Stack Web Developer online course from March 2021 to September 2021.

Regardless of their academic background, most of my refugee friends work at kebab shops, cleaning or repairing sectors. They think it is almost impossible to find a job outside of those jobs. Coding offers many other in-demand opportunities and skills. Learning coding doesnâ€™t requires spending a lot of time or money to find required resources as it is easy to access sufficient online resources. Coding is one of the few skills that will increase the chance for me to find a good job and have a social environment. Coding completely ignores ethnic origin, religion and cultural background.

I participate in activities voluntarily in charity organisations, named DIALOGUE SOCIETY and SUMMIT SOCIETY. I want to be a Web Developer to be a useful person in my new country. I am a quick learner, dedicated and open person.

Interests

I have several interests in my life. These are football, diving, volunteering for helping local community, reading, listening to music, doing research. I added a link to a song I love.
